Plot: An ex-con with a reputation tries to go straight by working as a handy man for a reclusive actress but this is unfortunately not the wish of London's underground crime lord.
Title: London Boulevard
Actors: Colin Farrell, Keira Knightley, David Thewlis, Anna Friel
tomatoConsensus: In spite of its spotless pedigree and a strong sense of visual style, London Boulevard stumbles over its frenetic pace and crowded, clichéd plot.
